name: WASD (craighughes)
description:
WASD is a game made for the player to discover what the program can do. the core part of the game is to use the up and down arrow keys in combination with the WASD keys to create combinations of characters to score points by pressing enter. On top of that there are secrets you can find while playing.

Pres escape to exit and R to restart.

*full list of secrets*

if you clear the top level of characters and then press z while you have that row selected you will change the row to purple Zs as long as it's empty

press C for Jerry

press space bar to refill the rows

press backspace to put letters in your current combination back into rows

press UP UP DOWN DOWN LEFT RIGHT LEFT RIGHT A B CONTROL to increase the amount of points you get for every combination.
